name: Political Darts
description:
Are you tired of political corruption?

Then this game is for you.

It is a very simple game to play to vent your anger and disgust at our corrupt political leaders that only care about themselves and their rich donors.

How to play : 

Point the dart with the mouse and left click to shoot the dart.

Hint:  The longer you left click the faster the dart will go.

All the proceeds from this page will be used to make this and other games that can be played on the android and ios platforms.
We also encourage you to post the game page on your Facebook Chanel and other social media outlets.

Lets get the word out and make life hard for those that ignore the wishes of the voters!

Please let us know how to make this game more interesting by dropping us a line in the comment box.

Thanks   :)
